entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near 6 except near plus 2 in onshore winds.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast early this afternoon. Temperature steady near 6 except near plus 2 in onshore winds. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow mixed with rain near midnight. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain changing to rain in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023
